December 29, 1958
Mr. William G. Harley
President-Elect
N.A.E.B.
Station WHA-TV
Madison, Wisconsin
Dear Bill:
I am in receipt of your official announcement of my chairman¬
ship of the NAEB Membership Committee as of your letter,
dated December 23, 1958. This notice also includes two
changes in Regional Committee members.
Under separate cover, I am in receipt of some related
materials from Harry Skornia having to do with the member¬
ship drive of DAVI.
Am I to assume that my responsibility is as of the first of
January, 1959? Am I further to assume that I am to devise
and set in motion some plan for a membership campaign?
These may seem like foolish questions, but I would prefer
that whatever effort is made on my part will be in keeping
with the thinking and planning of the President and Board
of Directors.
In any new membership campaigns, there are certain matters
of policy to be considered as well as means of operation.
Your counsel and assistance is needed before I proceed with
any campaign layout. Any suggestions are made as a means
of insuring the success of whatever effort we may exert.
Please advise at your earliest convenience.
RDH/ml Raymond D. Hurlbert
General Manager
